original_title: New circular issued for state school admissions
original_body_lines: A new circular has been issued regarding the admission of students from Grade 2 to Grade 11, excluding Grades 5 and 6, in government schools.
Accordingly, the Circular No. 27/2025 has been issued by the Ministry of Education, Higher Education, and Vocational Training.
The circular can now be accessed via the official website of the Ministry: http://www.moe.gov.lk.
